column4: how can I install xorg on my warty system then please I haven't seen it anywhere
kinda, ish. it has advantages and disadvantages
it means things like 32bit video codecs don't work without a 32bit chroot and some WINE things can be a bit of a pain
but generally I think it's a good move
I suspect that most of the "it's nicer than my old system" is more down to the larger busses than the CPU, since I went 2ghz 32bit->2ghz 64bit
glxgears doesn't run at unlimited speed and print out fps anymore, if you're using breezy.
thanks but cedega tries to use it then it comes up with no 3d acceleration
yes point to play small as I'm running 64bit
pass, it's a problem Transgaming will need to fix. You can just invoke cedega from the command line if you want
